div.em: Current conditions as of 19 Apr 21:53 pm CDT

div.div: Partly cloudy, with a low around 38. North northeast wind 5 to 7 mph.
Mostly sunny, with a high near 65. Light and variable wind becoming west 6 to 11 mph in the afternoon. Winds could gust as high as 17 mph.
A 20 percent chance of showers before 2am. Partly cloudy, with a low around 44. West southwest wind 8 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

p.b: Due to the Coronavirus (COVID-19) pandemic, Neoga CUSD #3 has canceled the following events for this school year:
Spring Sports (final determination by IHSA on Tuesday, April 21)

Those who paid activity fees for spring sports/events will have the option to take a refund from the district or apply the refund to next year’s fees. More information will be coming about that as soon as the IHSA makes a final determination about spring athletics and activities.

The following events have been postponed and we will make every reasonable effort to reschedule these events based upon the recommendations of health officials and government restrictions in the future.

It is the District’s plan to hold a graduation ceremony when conditions permit. Additional information concerning a graduation ceremony will be shared when the situation allows and a date can be finalized.
It should be noted that summer sports camps and open gyms will be postponed. If we are allowed to hold such events, we will communicate with our families as early as possible.

a.aria-label: Read more about End of Year 2020

div.p: The Neoga School District is actively 3D printing ear guards for essential workers at local hospitals and senior living locations. Currently the district has printed and donated over 120 ear guards and more are being made daily. If you are in need of an ear guard or know of someone that could benefit from these, please let us know and we would be happy to help out. #ILSchoolsStepUp #NeogaCares

a.aria-label: Read more about 3D Printed Ear Guards
